metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15860 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Xpdf 2.00 allows a SIGSEGV in XRef::constructXRef in XRef.cc. NOTE: 2.00 is a version from November 2002.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication that poppler is vulnerable to this issue ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
